picard.analysis.directed

Class CalculateHsMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • picard.cmdline.CommandLineProgram
      • picard.analysis.directed.CollectTargetedMetrics<HsMetrics,HsMetricCollector>
        • picard.analysis.directed.CollectHsMetrics
          • picard.analysis.directed.CalculateHsMetrics
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class CalculateHsMetrics
extends CollectHsMetrics
    Calculates a set of HS metrics from a sam or bam file. See HsMetricsCollector and CollectTargetedMetrics for more details.
